name: ichywt-backend
description: Simple site which allows people who are logged in through Facebook to find tasks that help out an organization who needs a skill they can offer - location/time constraints are matching.
author: ICHYWT Contributors

scripts.start: npm prune && npm install && NODE_ENV=development nodemon ./src/bootstrap.js
scripts.deploy: npm prune && npm install && ./node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/backend.js
scripts.kube:stage: gcloud container clusters get-credentials stage --zone us-central1-c
scripts.mongo:stage: npm run kube:stage && kubectl exec -it $(kubectl get pods -o name | grep mongo | sed 's/pod\///') -c mongo mongo
